title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the criticism Baker Mayfield is facing this week after their loss to the Chargers and what this means for Mayfield’s future as a franchise quarterback. He breaks down the Cowboys success thus far this season and what the secret formula is for them to be a Super Bowl contender. He also tells you who the best you quarterbacks are across the league. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to talk about Mayfield, the Cowboys as contenders and if the Chiefs should be worried about their slow start to the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
